text: 16|115|Allahe kerala mrta jantu, teja, gaharaira mansa arau yito jabeha karaara samayata allahara paraibarte anara nama loraa haiche se'itohe tomalokara babe haraama karaiche, kintu konoba'i abadhya ba simalanghanakarai nahai anan'yopaya haâ€™le (tara kono dosa na'i) tente niscaya allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu.
